ModMetaData.name: XxHyde840xX's Choice Chops - Volume Two
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX/Various
ModMetaData.description:
Another selection of choice items, carefully chopped from their respective mods. An exhaustive list is as follows;
- [Animals And Reskins] - There a a good chunk of these, I'm not cross referencing for links. There's far too many and I just want to package them up. - This is one of those "I'm trimming my list without trimming my list," inclusions. Sorry folks! - I am not the original author of these and all credit goes to the original creators and artists who did the reskins. - Obviously incompatible with the original versions, so if you see any of the below animals or skins in your list, yeet 'em!
- Milkrats / Tanuki / Rhodesian Ridgebacks / Pygmy Muffalo / Mamuffalo / Meat Pigs / Domestic Thrumbo / Coldwarg - Beefeaters / Muffaloaves / Boomaphants / Insect Meat Reskin / Another Milk Retexture - Re-Bagged! (I hackjobbed this one!)
Additional Notes:
- I've removed the glow comp from the Muffaloves. It was a stationary one that the plants use. It's better now. - I've also remove the patches for the "A Dog Said" mod as I don't use it. Sorry folks!
- [Geometric Floors, More Floor Coverings, and Royal Carpets by JF] - Love the mods, hate the vRAM usage on startup. Seriously, everything needed downscaling. Even the icons. - 1024x1024 MAXIMUM for floor textures. Icons down to 128x128 because they were nice. - There were around 800-900 textures resized, and it's only around 100-ish MB or so now. - Don't want the decor? Deal with it. It's here, and I'm not downscaling it again if my files reset for some reason. - The carpets were honestly fine, but they're here too.
- [JD's Simple Switch with Fixed Light Offsets] - I liked the switch. The lights were off. They are now where they should be. I didn't even notice the issue. - Big thanks to CaptainArbitrary in the RimWorld Discord Server for both alerting me to the problem, and having a fix. - All it was was just tweaked textures but it makes all the difference, especially once it was pointed out. - Enjoy the power switch! I know I do, the vanilla one is bland as hell.
=============================================================================================================================
This marks the end of this particular modpack. I've learned alot along the way, and despite the quirks, incompatibilities, and dependencies, I think I did an alright job for my first outing at putting something together. My only, and biggest regret with this project is that I will not be able to release it publicly. I will be working on other packs like this in the future, as well as some sorely needed original content, but in the meantime, I hope you enjoy XxHyde840xX's Choice Chops. Stay Safe, and Have Fun.
XxHyde840xX - o7
